actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide for the issuance of a commemorative postage stamp honoring George Mason.

summary.text: Directs the Postmaster General to issue a commemorative stamp in honor of George Mason for his contributions to the Virginia and Federal Constitutions.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the issuance of a commemorative postage stamp honoring George Mason.
